Title: Relates to funding for emergency management services for certain counties with non-operational nuclear power plants
Summary: Relates to funding for emergency management services for certain counties with non-operational nuclear power plants.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to funding for emergency management services for certain counties with non-operational nuclear power plants
